application

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.App
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class App
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that stores all the data needed to get the app working. This includes user data, offers, ... As it is Serializable, it can be writen and read from binary files, in order to store data for later uses
    Author:
    Miguel Arconada (miguel.arconada@estudiante.uam.es) y Alberto Gonzalez (alberto.gonzalezk@estudiante.uam.es)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • login

        public void login(java.lang.String id,
                  java.lang.String passwd)
           throws UserIsBannedException,
                  IncorrectPasswordException,
                  UnexistentUserException,
                  AUserIsAlreadyLoggedException
        Method that with a given id (NIF) and a password checks if the user is an authorized user and lets that user go into the system
        Parameters:
        id - NIF of the user trying to log in
        passwd - Password of the user trying to log in
        Throws:
        UserIsBannedException - When the user that is trying to log is been banned
        IncorrectPasswordException - When the password with which the user is trying to log is incorrect
        UnexistentUserException - When the user with the specified id cannot be found on the system
        AUserIsAlreadyLoggedException - When no user is logged on the system

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Method that logs out the user

      • closeApp

        public void closeApp()
        Method that closes the app, dumping the information into the file filename

      • openApp

        public static App openApp()
        Method that is called to start the system. If there it is the first time opening the system it reads and loads a list of users into the system. Otherwise, it reads the system's information from the file filename
        Returns:
        the system ready to function

      • payPendingOffers

        public void payPendingOffers()
        This method tries to pay all the money that has not been paid to the hosts

        o - Offer to be modified
        Throws:

                        Offer o)
                 throws InvalidRolException

        o - Offer to be modified
        Throws:

      • createLivingOffer

        public void createLivingOffer(java.time.LocalDate startingDate,
                              java.lang.Double price,
                              java.lang.Double deposit,
                              java.lang.String description,
                              House offeredHouse,
                              int numberOfMonths)
                       throws InvalidRolException,
                              NoUserLoggedException,
                              InvalidDateException,
                              NotTheOwnerException,
                              OfferAlreadyCreatedException
        Method that creates a living offer and loads it into the system
        Parameters:
        startingDate - Starting date of the offer
        price - Price per month to be paid
        deposit - Inicial deposit to be paid
        description - Description of the offer
        offeredHouse - House to create the offer with
        numberOfMonths - Number of months to live in the house
        Throws:
        InvalidRolException - When a non-host or a non-multirole user tries to create an offer
        NoUserLoggedException - When a non-logged user tries to create an offer
        InvalidDateException - When the starting date of the offer is before the date of the system
        NotTheOwnerException - When a user that is not the owner of a house tries to create an offer with that house
        OfferAlreadyCreatedException - When the same offer is already in the system

      • createHolidayOffer

        public void createHolidayOffer(java.time.LocalDate startingDate,
                               java.lang.Double price,
                               java.lang.Double deposit,
                               java.lang.String description,
                               House offeredHouse,
                               java.time.LocalDate finishDate)
                        throws InvalidRolException,
                               NoUserLoggedException,
                               InvalidDateException,
                               NotTheOwnerException,
                               OfferAlreadyCreatedException
        Method that creates a holiday offer and loads it into the system
        Parameters:
        startingDate - Starting date of the offer
        price - Price per month to be paid
        deposit - Inicial deposit to be paid
        description - Description of the offer
        offeredHouse - House to create the offer with
        finishDate - End date of the offer
        Throws:
        InvalidRolException - When a non-host or a non-multirole user tries to create an offer
        NoUserLoggedException - When a non-logged user tries to create an offer
        InvalidDateException - When the starting date of the offer is before the date of the system
        NotTheOwnerException - When a user that is not the owner of a house tries to create an offer with that house
        OfferAlreadyCreatedException - When the same offer is already in the system

      • suggestChanges

        public void suggestChanges(Offer o,
                           java.lang.String description)
                    throws InvalidOfferStatusException,
                           InvalidRolException
        Method used by Admins to suggest changes in an Offer in order to approve it
        Parameters:
        o - Offer that the admin has reviewed
        description - Description of the suggestion of changes
        Throws:
        InvalidOfferStatusException - When an admin tries to suggest changes to a offer that is not pending for approval
        InvalidRolException - When a non-admin user tries to suggest changes

      • approveOffer

        public void approveOffer(Offer o)
                  throws OfferIsPendingForChangesExceptions,
                         InvalidRolException
        Method used by an Admin to mark an offer as approved
        Parameters:
        o - Offer to be approved
        Throws:
        OfferIsPendingForChangesExceptions - When the offer that is trying to be approved is still pending for changes
        InvalidRolException - When a non-admin user tries to approve an offer

      • requestRevision

        public void requestRevision(Offer o)
                     throws InvalidRolException,
                            NotTheOwnerException
        Method used by a Host in order to request approval of an Offer after changes have been made
        Parameters:
        o - Offer to be reviewed
        Throws:
        InvalidRolException - When a non-host or a non-multirole user tries to request a revision
        NotTheOwnerException - When a user that does not own the offer tries to use the method

      • createHouse

        public House createHouse(java.lang.Integer zip,
                         java.lang.String city)
                  throws InvalidRolException,
                         NoUserLoggedException
        Method that creates if the logged user has a valid role
        Parameters:
        zip - ZIP code of the house
        city - City in which the the house is located
        Returns:
        the created house
        Throws:
        InvalidRolException - When the logged user is neither a host nor a multiRoleUser
        NoUserLoggedException - When the app could not retrieve the logged user

      • addHouse

        public void addHouse(House house)
              throws InvalidRolException,
                     NoUserLoggedException,
                     NotTheOwnerException
        Method that adds a house to the system if the owner of the house and the logged user match, and if the logged user is a host
        Parameters:
        house - House to add to the system
        Throws:
        InvalidRolException - When the logged user is neither a host nor a multiRoleUser
        NoUserLoggedException - When the app could not retrieve the logged user
        NotTheOwnerException - When the logged user is not the owner of the house

        public void addReservation(Offer o)
                    throws InvalidRolException,
                           RestrictedUserException
        Method that checks the conditions and calls the user method addReservation
        Parameters:
        o - Offer to book
        Throws:
        InvalidRolException - When a non-guest or a non-multirole tries to book an offer
        RestrictedUserException - When a restricted user tries to book that offer

      • changeCreditCard

        public void changeCreditCard(java.lang.String creditCard,
                             RegisteredUser user)
                      throws InvalidRolException
        Method that checks the user and if the card number is valid and calls the user method changeCreditCard
        Parameters:
        creditCard - new creditcard number
        user - The user whose creditcard number is going to be changed
        Throws:
        InvalidRolException - When a non-admin user tries to change a card number
